content: Come to think of it, this is...{A喜欢}{短暂停} even more mysterious! Thank you for helping me find them. <style=SizeSmall>I'd better study a few more before my thesis deadline comes hunting for me...</style>
It's not really a meteor... more like something mysterious drifting in from the Starsea.
{A笑眯眯}Though I'm still off traveling, I'm already looking forward to seeing you again. Next time we meet, don't forget to come find me for another reading, yeep~!
Ah, you found the Shooting Star! Please, let me take a look.
Perhaps it's due to the connections between everything in the Starsea. Sometimes, across different planets, things simply appear... or vanish.
